name: Again: Interactive Crime Novel
description: Again: Interactive Crime Novel, known in Japan as Again: FBI Chōshinri Sōsakan (AGAIN　FBI超心理捜査官, "Again: FBI Parapsychological Investigator"), is an adventure video game developed by Cing and published by Tecmo for the Nintendo DS. It was released in Japan on December 10, 2009 and in North America on March 30, 2010. It was originally titled Again: Eye of Providence.
